summary: This is an email chain between a U.S. Attorney's Office prosecutor and defense attorney Roy Black regarding scheduling a discussion about the Jeffrey Epstein matter, specifically relating to the performance of the Non-Prosecution Agreement.

persons.name: Roy Black
persons.context: Defense attorney for Jeffrey Epstein, being contacted by a prosecutor to discuss the Epstein matter and the Non-Prosecution Agreement.

events.title: Discussion of Epstein Non-Prosecution Agreement
events.description: A prosecutor attempts to schedule a discussion with defense attorney Roy Black regarding the Jeffrey Epstein matter, specifically about the performance of the Non-Prosecution Agreement.

locations: 500 S. Australian Ave, Suite 400 West Palm Beach, FL 33401
keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated July 30, 2008, regarding Jeffrey Epstein.
The subject of the proposed discussion is the 'performance of the Non-Prosecution Agreement' in the Epstein case.
The correspondence is between a U.S. Attorney's Office prosecutor and defense attorney Roy Black.
The prosecutor's office is located in West Palm Beach, Florida, indicating the jurisdiction of the case.
